description: Unspecified vulnerability in Hitachi EUR Form Client before 05-10 -/D 2010.11.15 and 05-10-CA (* 2) 2010.11.15; Hitachi EUR Form Service before 05-10 -/D 2010.11.15; and uCosminexus EUR Form Service before 07-60 -/D 2010.11.15 on Windows, before 05-10 -/D 2010.11.15 and 07-50 -/D 2010.11.15 on Linux, and before 07-50 -/C 2010.11.15 on AIX; allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown attack vectors.
